import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; function Update() { const {id} = useParams(); const [inputData, setInputData] = useState({ cim: '', datum: '', fo: '', iranyitoszam: '', nev: '', }) const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); axios.post('http://localhost:3030/foglalasok',inputData ) .then(res => { alert("Data Posted Successfully!") navigate('/') }) } return (
setInputData({...inputData, cim: e.target.value}) }/>
setInputData({...inputData, datum: e.target.value}) }/>
setInputData({...inputData, fo: e.target.value}) }/>
setInputData({...inputData, iranyitoszam: e.target.value}) }/>
setInputData({...inputData, nev: e.target.value}) }/>

) } export default Update
